page.title: 19Farm Annual Calendar
page.content: AN Hedging\ditching, tree & machinery maintenance. Snow clearing. FEB Spring drilling, tree planting\care MAR Spring drilling, spraying & top dressing APR Spraying\top dressing, building maintenance MAY Spraying\top dressing, tree and building maintenance JUN Spraying\top dressing; building and machinery maintenance. JUL Preparing grain storage and machinery for harvest. Harvest starts late July AUG Harvest\ploughing, ground prepared for next crop SEP Complete harvest. Land preparation for Autumn drilling OCT Drilling & spraying NOV Ditto, hedging & tree maintenance DEC Hedging & tree maintenance Average hours 40-80(harvest) per week
